name: APPRIME agency
tag_list: vacancy, job-offer, position, employee, seeking, looking-for, staff, employees, work, abroad, work-mediation, worker, workers
overview:
EMPLOYERS SECTION

VACANCY SUBMISSION

“Do you require any assistance with finding the right staff

to fill in an existing position in your company?”

You are in the right place at the right time!

We are still young, but strong-minded and swiftly advancing recruitment agency, focusing on a wide range of industries. During the time of our existence, we have built top relationships with our partners abroad. Our idea could easily be expressed in this short sentence:

â€žYou tell us exactly what you need and we will try our best to give it to you!â€œ

APPRIME agency is able to supply a quality, highly skilled staff with or without communicative knowledge of various languages (depending on your preferences), for the different types of industries.

We are operating under GLA license,

unique reference APPR0001.

Please, let us know the details of the position by completing the provided form. The completed form should be returned to us via email: poprad@apprimeagency.com

The vacancy submission form can be found here

(We are currently working on this section. If you require our assistance, please send us an email requesting your copy of the vacancy submission form and it will be sent out to you. Your patience is appreciated.)
